section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: BAYER#Bastian, CHATENAY#Victor, GOBBATO#Massimiliano, GOZLAN#Maud, MONACO#Monica, TREPAT SOLSONA#Blanca
goals__remit: PubAffairs Bruxelles is an indipendent and not-for-profit think tank and a cross-sectorial network of professionals working in the fields of public and regulatory affairs correlated to the European Union. PubAffairs Bruxelles aims at creating an open platform to foster debate, information exchange as well as the development of ideas among its members, establishing a diverse community which encompasses young, as well as experienced professionals.
